name: Industry City Banks
description: Repurposed industrial complex with butter-smooth ground, mellow banks, and endless ledge lines.
history: As Industry City gentrified, skaters discovered the perfect smooth concrete and architectural features. A modern classic.
bestTimes: Weekday evenings after businesses close. Weekend mornings work too.
transitDirections: D/N/R to 36th St, walk west toward the waterfront.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include banks, ledges, smooth ground, loading docks. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in Sunset Park. As Industry City gentrified, skaters discovered the perfect smooth concrete and architectural features. A modern classic.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: D/N/R to 36th St, walk west toward the waterfront.. Weekday evenings after businesses close. Weekend mornings work too.
detailedNotes.warnings: Street spot â€” be respectful of the space and watch for security.
